ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>

var mid = result.match(/itemIds([\s\S]+?)hasFetchDirectory/)[1];

var id = String(mid).replace(/\,\,/g,',').replace(/\"/g,'').replace(/\[/g,'').replace(/\]/g,'');
var url = id.split(",");
url =url.reverse()
var list = [];
for(var i=1;i<mid.length;i++){list.push({n:'第'+i+'章',m:'https://writer.muyewx.com/reader/'+url[i]})};
list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
	   for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
		    newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
	   return newArr
  }
  let array = []
    let v = []
  let res = JSON.parse(result)
  let item_list = spArr(res.data.allItemIds,100)
  let page = item_list.length;
  for(i=0;i<page;i++) {
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');
    let data=JSON.parse(response).data;
    data.forEach((x)=>{    	if(JSON.stringify(v).indexOf(x.volume_name)==-1){
    	array.push({
    		name:'📖['+x.volume_name+']📖',
    		isVolume:true
    		});
    				
    			 v.push(x.volume_name)
    			 }
          array.push({
            name: x.title,
            url:'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.item_id+'&item_id='+x.item_id+'&aid=1977'
      })
    })
  }
  array
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
	   for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
		    newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
	   return newArr
  }
  let array = []
    let v = []
  let res = JSON.parse(result)
  let item_list = spArr(res.data.allItemIds,100)
  let page = item_list.length;
  for(i=0;i<page;i++) {
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');
    let data=JSON.parse(response).data;
    data.forEach((x)=>{    	if(JSON.stringify(v).indexOf(x.volume_name)==-1){
    	array.push({
    		name:'📖['+x.volume_name+']📖',
    		isVolume:true
    		});
    				
    			 v.push(x.volume_name)
    			 }
          array.push({
            name: x.title,
            url:'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.item_id+'&item_id='+x.item_id+'&aid=1977'
      })
    })
  }
  array
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  function spArr(arr, num) {
    let newArr = []
    for (let i = 0; i < arr.length;) {
      newArr.push(arr.slice(i, i += num));
    }
    return newArr
  }
  function getTitle(x, name){
    if (variable){
      if (variable["volume"]["status"] == true && variable["volume"]["mode"] == 2){
        return x.volume_name + (variable["volume"]["spacer"] || " | ") + name;
      } else {
        return name;
      }
    } else {
      return name;
    }
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  try {
    variable = JSON.parse(variable);
  } catch(err){
    variable = false;
  }
  
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let item_list = spArr(data["item_list"], 100)
  let array = [];
  
  for (let i = 0; i < item_list.length; i++){
    let response = java.ajax('https://api5-normal-lq.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/directory/all_infos/v/?item_ids=' + item_list[i] + '&iid=2718442795830583&aid=1967&version_code=290');

    let ChapterData = JSON.parse(response).data;
    ChapterData.forEach((x) => {
    	
      if(variable && variable["volume"]["status"] == true && variable["volume"]["mode"] == 1){
        if (JSON.stringify(array).indexOf(x.volume_name) == -1) {
          array.push({
            title: x.volume_name,
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      array.push({
        title: getTitle(x, x.title),
        url: 'https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/reader/full/v1/?group_id=' + x.group_id + '&item_id=' + x.item_id + '&aid=1977',
        item_id: x.item_id,
        group_id: x.group_id,
        first_pass_time: x.first_pass_time,
        updateTime: java.timeFormat(x.first_pass_time * 1000),
        isVolume: false
      })
    });
  }
  array
</js>

ruleBookInfo.kind: <js>let data = JSON.parse(src).page; let tag; switch(data.status){case 0: tag = "完结";break;case 4: tag = "完结";break;case 1: tag = "连载中";break;case -1: tag = "已断更";break;default: tag =  "已下架";} let tags = JSON.parse(data.categoryV2); tags = tags.map((t) => {return t.Name}); tags.unshift(tag); tags</js>

ruleBookInfo.kind: <js>let data = JSON.parse(src).page; let tag; switch(data.status){case 0: tag = "完结";break;case 4: tag = "完结";break;case 1: tag = "连载中";break;case -1: tag = "已断更";break;default: tag =  "已下架";} let tags = JSON.parse(data.categoryV2); tags = tags.map((t) => {return t.Name}); tags.unshift(tag); tags</js>

bookSourceComment:
此书源可以开箱即用，无需进行其他操作
但由于此书源API来自于番茄Web共享API服务项目，API来自于共享地址，而共享地址目前仅来自一台云手机
因此，如果你有能力搭建番茄web服务，请尽量自己搭建后共享（如果所有人都选择白嫖而不去搭建，那么所有人都将无法使用此API/书源）
此书源使用Xposed模块番茄Web 搭建
番茄Web地址：因版权原因，请自行搜索
模块下载：自行使用action
书源：Wodlie
项目经过了一些代理节点，会有点慢（云手机→frps云服务器→cloudflare→你）
感谢 移动云手机 freefrp.net https://github.com/AceDroidX/frp-Android 提供部分软件支持
目前免费线路会时不时断线，如果你有经济可以赞助我：
https://ifdian.net/a/Wodlie

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName: title<js>##正文卷.|正文.|VIP章节.|免费章节.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订/万架字票合补加].*?[】）\)]</js>
